Welcome to My Portfolio

Hello, my name is Oliver Roy, an Azure-focused IT professional with a strong foundation in Microsoft Azure administration, cloud infrastructure, and security fundamentals. I hold multiple Microsoft Azure certifications, including Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900), Azure Administrator Associate (AZ-104), and Azure Solutions Architect Expert (AZ-305). Through hands-on labs, applied skills, and structured learning, I’ve developed practical experience managing Azure resources, configuring identity and access controls, implementing secure networking, and supporting cloud-based environments. My interests center around cloud support, cloud operations, and security-aware infrastructure, where reliability, troubleshooting, and attention to detail are critical. I enjoy breaking down complex technical issues, following documented best practices, and continuously improving systems through learning and iteration. I’m currently seeking entry-level or junior cloud-focused roles where I can contribute immediately while continuing to grow under experienced teams. I’m particularly interested in roles that involve Azure administration, cloud support, identity management, and foundational security practices. This portfolio highlights my certifications, applied skills, and projects that demonstrate my current capabilities and my commitment to building a long-term career in the cloud computing community. Feel free to reach out via email or connect with me on LinkedIn.
